name: phq_9
description: The PHQ-9 is a multipurpose instrument for screening, diagnosing, monitoring and measuring the severity of a person's depression

questions.text: How often have you been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?
How often have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

name: gad_7
description: This test is a seven-item instrument that is used to measure or assess the severity of generalized anxiety disorder (GAD)

questions.text: How often have you been feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
How often have you not been able to stop or control worrying?
